committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation

official_title: A bill to amend the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to establish the Friends of Kaloko-Honokohau, an advisory commission for the Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park, and for other purposes.
short_title: Na Hoa Pili Kaloko-Honokohau Re-establishment Act of 1995

summary.text: Na Hoa Pili Kaloko-Honokohau Re-establishment Act of 1995 - Re-establishes the Na Hoa Pili O Kaloko-Honokohau (the Advisory Commission for Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park), in accordance with provisions of the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978.

titles.title: Na Hoa Pili Kaloko-Honokohau Re-establishment Act of 1995

A bill to amend the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to establish the Friends of Kaloko-Honokohau, an advisory commission for the Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park, and for other purposes.
